REMARKS :
BÃ¶ggemann ( 2002 )
considers
Glycera rouxii Audouin & Milne-Edwards, 1833
as a synonym of
G. unicornis
, but assumes this position to be uncertain, due to the lack of type material of the first. In the present checklist the proposed synonymy is applied and records of two species are regarded as
G. unicornis
.
